alert.note: Alert for Clay; Lincoln; Turner; Union (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 24 at 2:58AM MDT until June 24 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 369 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN IOWA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN NORTHWEST IOWA CHEROKEE LYON PLYMOUTH SIOUX IN WEST CENTRAL IOWA IDA WOODBURY IN NEBRASKA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST NEBRASKA DAKOTA DIXON IN SOUTH DAKOTA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST SOUTH DAKOTA CLAY LINCOLN TURNER UNION THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALCESTER, ALLEN, BATTLE CREEK, BERESFORD, CANTON, CENTERVILLE, CHANCELLOR, CHEROKEE, ELK POINT, GEORGE, HARRISBURG, HAWARDEN, HOLSTEIN, HULL, HURLEY, IDA GROVE, INWOOD, IRENE, JEFFERSON, LARCHWOOD, LE MARS, LENNOX, MARION, NORTH SIOUX CITY, ORANGE CITY, PARKER, PONCA, ROCK RAPIDS, ROCK VALLEY, SIOUX CENTER, SIOUX CITY, SOUTH SIOUX CITY, TEA, VERMILLION, VIBORG, AND WAKEFIELD.
